translations: v.抱怨；不满（repine 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 劳而无怨, 劳而不怨

sentences.sentence: Pearl, who had enough shadow in her own little life, chose to break off all acquaintance with this repining brook.
sentences.translation: 在她小小的生命中已经有了太多的阴影的珠儿，便放弃了这条如泣如诉的小溪，不再和它交往。

sentences.sentence: So Pearl, who had enough of shadow in her own little life, chose to break off all acquaintance with this repining brook.
sentences.translation: 于是，在她小小的生命中已经有了太多的阴影的珠儿，便放弃了这条如泣如诉的小溪，不再和它交往。

sentences.sentence: The vision sign has something to do with basic feel form in all kinds of realms, it is not abstract, and also not empty, seems to always fill with living nicety and nice repining in the humanly feels.
sentences.translation: 视觉符号与各个领域中的基本感觉形式有关，它并不抽象，也不空洞，似乎它在人类的感知上总是充满了生活的美好和对美的向往。
